title: Service Dog
description: A service animal displayed with a safety vest and lead. Differs from the guide dog as this animal is intended for detection of seizures or other “hidden disabilities”, according to the proposal from Apple.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the service dog emoji is rendered with a friendly, intelligent expression, often depicted as a golden retriever or similar breed with soft, rounded edges and realistic fur texture. Its posture is alert yet calm, conveying loyalty and helpfulness, while Apple's signature glossy shading adds a touch of warmth and approachability. This emoji on Apple devices is a symbol of assistance, companionship, and unwavering support, perfect for messages about pets, help, or emotional comfort.
